disclaimer.title: Terms of Service and Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: Welcome to use "NCNU Super Assistant" (hereinafter referred to as "this Service" or "Website"). This Service is independently developed and maintained by individuals or groups unrelated to National Chi Nan University (hereinafter referred to as "the School"). Please carefully read the following Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "these Terms") before using this Service. By using this Service, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms.
disclaimer.section1Content:
This Service provides reference tools for school-related information, including but not limited to course selection inquiry, course information, graduation required course progress tracking, campus calendar, etc.

This Service is non-official and non-profit in nature. All information is sourced from public data or third-party crawling, and is not the School's official announcements or systems. The website owner (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "Owner") has no affiliation, collaboration, or authorization relationship with the School.
disclaimer.section2Content:
Disclaimer on Information Accuracy: Any information provided by this Service (including course schedules, graduation requirements, calendars, etc.) is for reference only and is not guaranteed to be complete, real-time, accurate, or error-free. You shall refer to the School's official academic affairs system, new academic affairs system announcements, School website, or official documents.

Disclaimer on Functional Liability: We shall not be liable for any damages, errors, delays, data loss, or decision-making mistakes arising from any functions of this Service (including but not limited to course selection assistance, progress tracking, calendar notifications). Any losses incurred by users due to reliance on this Service (including academic, economic, or other indirect losses) shall be borne by the users themselves.

Disclaimer on Third-Party Links: This Service may contain links to the School or other third-party websites, and we are not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or security.

Disclaimer on Force Majeure: Due to unforeseen events such as natural disasters, network interruptions, School system changes, or legal amendments, this Service may be suspended or modified, and we assume no compensation liability.
disclaimer.section3Content:
You agree to use this Service only for lawful, personal non-commercial purposes and not for any illegal, infringing, or interfering with School systems activities.

You shall independently evaluate the reliability of the information and bear all consequences of use. For any questions, please contact the School's academic affairs unit directly.
disclaimer.section4Content:
This Service may collect necessary user data (such as login accounts, browsing records) solely for service improvement and will not sell or misuse it. See this Service's Privacy Policy for details.

We are not responsible for user-uploaded or input data.
disclaimer.section5Content:
The interface and code of this Service are protected by copyright, and users shall not copy, modify, or use commercially.

School-related information belongs to the School's intellectual property, and we only provide reference tools without claiming any rights.
disclaimer.section6Content:
We may amend these Terms at any time and announce on the website. Continued use shall be deemed acceptance of changes.

We reserve the right to terminate this Service or user accounts at any time without prior notice.
disclaimer.section7Content:
These Terms are governed by the laws of Taiwan, and disputes shall be submitted to the jurisdiction of the Taichung District Court in Taiwan.

If any provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain effective.
disclaimer.section8Content: If you have any questions about this Service or these Terms, please contact us via the following methods (we do not guarantee immediate response):
disclaimer.warningText: By using this Service, you confirm that you are at least 20 years old (or have consent from your legal guardian) and fully agree to all the above Terms. If you disagree, please stop using immediately.
